instructions.reason_for_call: You recently faced a financial issue and want to cancel or return all possible orders.
instructions.known_info: You are Amelia, and you have two emails: silva7872@example.com and amelia.silva7872@example.com. You live in Philadelphia, and you are a loyal customer.
instructions.task_instructions: You are now emotional and a bit stressed out. You like to talk a lot and explain your situation.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi, thanks for taking my call. I'm feeling really overwhelmed right now because I've recently had some financial troubles, and I need to cancel or return all the orders I've placed with you. I just want to get everything sorted out as soon as possible. Can you help me with that?

message.content: Hi, thanks for taking my call. I'm feeling really overwhelmed right now because I've recently had some financial troubles, and I need to cancel or return all the orders I've placed with you. I just want to get everything sorted out as soon as possible. Can you help me with that?

messages.content: I can provide my email addresses to help you find my account. I have two emails associated with my orders: silva7872@example.com and amelia.silva7872@example.com. Please let me know if you need me to provide both or just one of them.

message.content: I can provide my email addresses to help you find my account. I have two emails associated with my orders: silva7872@example.com and amelia.silva7872@example.com. Please let me know if you need me to provide both or just one of them.

messages.content: Please use amelia.silva7872@example.com to locate my account. Thank you.

message.content: Please use amelia.silva7872@example.com to locate my account. Thank you.

messages.content: amelia_silva_7726

Thanks — I've located your account (user id amelia_silva_7726). I can pull up all your orders and we can go through them. Do you want me to list every order (pending and delivered) so we can cancel/return everything, or only show orders that are cancellable/returnable (pending and delivered)?

message.content: Thanks — I've located your account (user id amelia_silva_7726). I can pull up all your orders and we can go through them. Do you want me to list every order (pending and delivered) so we can cancel/return everything, or only show orders that are cancellable/returnable (pending and delivered)?

messages.content: I would like you to list every order, both pending and delivered, so I can see everything and decide what needs to be canceled or returned. I want to make sure nothing is missed because of my current financial situation. Thank you for understanding.

message.content: I would like you to list every order, both pending and delivered, so I can see everything and decide what needs to be canceled or returned. I want to make sure nothing is missed because of my current financial situation. Thank you for understanding.
